com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients

Interface SerializationAdapter<F,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - the input-type of this adapter.
    T - the output-type of this adapter.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaSerializationAdapter, PingSerializationAdapter

    public interface SerializationAdapter<F,T>
    This Adapter will serialize a F into a T.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get(F f)
      Serializes an f into an T.
      static List<SerializationAdapter<Object,String>> getDefaultFallback()
      Creates the default SerializationAdapters, utilizing the Java-Serialization, which will be used, once the main-serialization fails.
      static SerializationAdapter<Object,String> getDefaultJavaDeSerialization()
      Creates the default SerializationAdapter, utilizing the Java-Serialization.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultJavaDeSerialization

        static SerializationAdapter<Object,String> getDefaultJavaDeSerialization()
        Creates the default SerializationAdapter, utilizing the Java-Serialization.
        Returns:
        a new Instance.

      • getDefaultFallback

        static List<SerializationAdapter<Object,String>> getDefaultFallback()
        Creates the default SerializationAdapters, utilizing the Java-Serialization, which will be used, once the main-serialization fails.
        Returns:
        a new Instance.

      • get

        T get(F f)
throws SerializationFailedException
        Serializes an f into an T.

        Most likely, an Object will be serialized into a String.

        Parameters:
        f - the input type.
        Returns:
        the serialized input type.
        Throws:
        SerializationFailedException - if this adapter cannot Serialize the input
